list.name: Deployment Scale Events
list.rawQuery:
SELECT
  extract(epoch from time_column) AS time,
  text_column as text,
  tags_column as tags
FROM
  metric_table
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time_column)

  text_column as text,

panels.title: Memory Out of Limit by Workload

targets.expr: topk(20, avg by (remote_addr) (groundcover_resource_latency_seconds{type="dns", namespace='$namespace', role="client", quantile="0.50"}))
